name: notifier
description: ðŸ”” An application that reminds you of things.

scripts.build:windows: find ./dist/apps -name 'notifier-win32-*' -exec rm -rf {} +; find ./dist/installers -name '*.exe' -exec rm -rf {} +; node build.js --windows
scripts.build:macos: find ./dist/apps -name 'notifier-darwin-*' -exec rm -rf {} +; find ./dist/installers -name '*.dmg' -exec rm -rf {} +; node build.js --macos
scripts.build:linux: find ./dist/apps -name 'notifier-linux-*' -exec rm -rf {} +; find ./dist/installers -name '*.deb' -exec rm -rf {} +; node build.js --linux

author: stickyPiston
